name: DrugWizard
0:
”Alexa, open drug wizard”
”Alexa, start drug wizard”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: drug wizard
des:
Alexa can help you learn new topics or study for your test. You can review the flash cards and then test your knowledge. At any point you can say "Alexa, review mode" to switch to review or say "Alexa, test mode" to start a test. You can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next card. At any point during the test, you can say "Alexa, what's my score" to get your current test score.
Disclaimer: The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
